sn35.236:1.5: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, cakkhusmim sati cakkhusamphassapaccaya uppajjati ajjhattam sukham dukkham …pe…
sn35.236:1.6: jivhaya sati jivhasamphassapaccaya uppajjati ajjhattam sukham dukkham …pe…
sn35.236:1.7: manasmim sati manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati ajjhattam sukham dukkham …pe….
sn35.236:2.1: Hatthesu, bhikkhave, asati adananikkhepanam na pannayati;
sn35.236:2.4: kucchismim asati jighaccha pipasa na pannayati.
sn35.236:2.5: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, cakkhusmim asati cakkhusamphassapaccaya nuppajjati ajjhattam sukham dukkham …pe…
sn35.236:2.7: manasmim asati manosamphassapaccaya nuppajjati ajjhattam sukham dukkhan”ti.
